snippet.title: Graphic Designing Promo
snippet.description:
Graphic Designing Course Details
• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Start Date: 01 Aug 2019
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Anyone having basic IT Knowledge

• Video Medium: Urdu & English

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger  (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.



#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan,
#Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Learn, #Earn


1. Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar,
2. AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain,
3. Creative Writing,  Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman
4. Digital Literacy, Vu Team,
5. Digital Marketing,  Dr. Yasir Rashid,
6. E-Commerce Management,  Sheraz Pervaiz,
7. Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar,
8. SEO, Search Enginge Optimization, Usman Latif,
9. QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan
10. WordPress, Saad Hamid,

What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:

This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.
 
What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.

• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.

• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.

snippet.description:
Graphic Design Course Details

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Anyone having basic IT Knowledge
• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.

snippet.title: Graphic Design 057 Adobe Illustrator, Selection Tool, Tutor Yasir Javed in Urdu,Hindi by DigiSkills
snippet.description:
Graphic Design Course Details

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Anyone having basic IT Knowledge
• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.
 
What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

snippet.title: Graphic Design 064 Adobe Illustrator, Add Anchor, Delete Anchor and Convert Anchor Point Tool,
snippet.description:
Graphic Design Course Details

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Anyone having basic IT Knowledge
• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.
 
What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://guru.com/,

snippet.title: Graphic Design 071 Adobe Illustrator, Type Tool Part 01, Tutor Yasir Javed in Urdu,Hindi, DigiSkills
snippet.description:
Graphic Design Course Details

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Anyone having basic IT Knowledge
• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.
 
What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

#DigiSkills, #Ignite, #Virtual_University, #Ministry_of_Information_Technology, #Govt_of_Pakistan, #Tutorial, #Course, #Urdu, #Hindi, #Learn, #Earn, #Complete_Course, #How_To,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Anyone having basic IT Knowledge
• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.
 
What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://fiverr.com/,
https://upwork.com/,
https://freelancer.com/,
https://guru.com/,
https://peopleperhour.com/,
http://firstfreelance.com/,

• Batch Duration: 12 Weeks
• Videos Duration: 24 hours
• Fee: Free of Cost
• Who can Join: Anyone having basic IT Knowledge
• Video Medium: Urdu & English

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.
 
What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://digiskills.pk/CourseDetails.aspx?Id=GRD101

About
Graphic Design, also known as communication design, is the art and practice of planning and projecting ideas and experiences with visual and textual content. This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:

This course is focused on both theoretical and practical parts. The aim of the course is to develop design sense in trainees by the help of theoretical concepts and practice. 

The focus of practical part will be on designing software e.g. Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Different exercises related to online market requirements will be assigned to the trainees. So that they can work professionally in online market.
Meet The Trainer

Yasir Javed Doger (Masters in Fine Arts - Specialization in Graphic Design)
Yasir Javed Doger is a highly creative and experienced Graphic Designer. He holds a master’s degree in Fine arts (Specialized in Graphic Design) from College of Art & Design Punjab University and M Phil in Film & TV from Beaconhouse National University. He always had a flair for creative arts.
 
He has an experience of working for more than 8 years, as a Senior Graphic Designer/Art Director in creative industry. He developed creative expertise in different mediums of communication such as print, electronic and cyber media. He worked for the big names like Levis (Pakistan), Subway (Pakistan), Seasons Food Industries, Sitara Studio, Metro Cash & Carry and Monsanto. He is also well versed in the art and craft of Photography, Photo Retouching & Video Production.
 
He has more than 3 years of experience as a Teacher/ Trainer. Having worked with both Government and Private sectors. Currently, he is serving as a Lecturer at Fine Arts Department, GCU Lahore and a visiting trainer with few private training institutes.
 
His brainchild: “1DOT MEDIA” is a creative studio offering wide variety of creative services like: Graphic Design, Branding, Motion Graphics, Photography and Digital Film-Making, to its prestigious clients, all under one roof. 
What you will learn
After completing this course, trainees will be able to:-


o Present ideas\illustrations using the basic concepts of Design.
o Develop basic sense of Graphic Designing with the help of both theory and practice.
o Implement the basic concepts of Graphic Design in freelancing projects.
o Professionally use the graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop.
o Identify the important commercial jobs of Graphic Designer.
o Perform various graphic designing jobs such as designing logos, posters, billboards, calendars, web pages and info graphics etc.
o Earn through performing the above said tasks in online market.
o Fulfill the requirements of online market in reference to freelancing as a Graphic Designer.
 
What is the DigiSkills Program?

The digital skills industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
Advent of new ICT technologies has opened a myriad of new possibilities for knowledge workers across the globe by enabling them to provide their services remotely to clients. By leveraging these ICT technologies, a new on-demand economy is being created, where professional activities broken into discrete assignments are offered to a virtual cloud of aspiring workers. This industry, often referred to as online outsourcing, is expected to generate gross service revenue between $15 billion and $25 billion by 2020.
This is envisaged to be achieved through a national level program, which will train target audiences in freelancing and other specialized skills listed below:
 
Freelancing, Hisham Sarwar, 
AutoCAD, Syed Arif Hussain, 
Creative Writing, Amena Aly Kamaal, Ayesha Fazlur Rehman 
Digital Literacy, Vu Team, 
Digital Marketing, Dr. Yasir Rashid, 
E-Commerce Management, Sheraz Pervaiz, 
Graphic Designing, Yasir Javed Dogar, 
SEO, Usman Latif, 
QuickBooks, Syed Hassan Adnan 
WordPress, Saad Hamid,

https://freelancer.com/,
https://guru.com/,
